Song.title: You Never Let Go
Song.copyright: Â© 2005 Matt and Beth Redman. Thank you music

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [A]
{key:G} CHORUS: [G]Oh no, You never let go, through the calm and through the storm [Em7]Oh no, You never let go, in ev'ry high and ev'ry low [Dsus]Oh no you never let go, [C2]Lord you never let go of me [G]
{key:A} CHORUS: [A]Oh no, You never let go, through the calm and through the storm [F#m7]Oh no, You never let go, in ev'ry high and ev'ry low [Esus]Oh no you never let go, [D2]Lord you never let go of me [A]
VERSE 1: Even though I w[A]alk through the valley of the shadow of death Your [F#m7]perfect love is casting out fear Even when I'm c[A]aught in the middle of the storms of this life I [F#m7]won't turn back, I know you are near
PRE CHORUS: And I will fear no [F#m7 E A]e - vil For my God is [F#m7 E A]with me And if my God is [F#m7 E A]with - me Whom then shall I f[E]ear, whom then shall I f[D2]ear
CHORUS: [A]Oh no, You never let go, through the calm and through the storm [F#m7]Oh no, You never let go, in ev'ry high and ev'ry low [Esus]Oh no you never let go, [D2]Lord you never let go of me [A]
VERSE 2: And I can see a [A]light that is coming for the heart that holds on A glori[F#m7]ous light beyond all compare And there will be an [A]end to these troubles but until that day comes We'll [F#m7]live to know You here on the earth
{new_page} BRIDGE: Yes, I can see a [A]light that is coming for the heart that holds on And there will be an [F#m7]end to these troubles but until that day comes [Esus]Still I will praise You, [Dsus]still I will praise you
{key:A} CHORUS: [A]Oh no, You never let go, through the calm and through the storm [F#m7]Oh no, You never let go, in ev'ry high and ev'ry low [Esus]Oh no you never let go, [D2]Lord you never let go of me [A]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro chorus oh no you never let go through the calm and through the storm oh no you never let go in evry high and evry low oh no you never let go lord you never let go of me chorus oh no you never let go through the calm and through the storm oh no you never let go in evry high and evry low oh no you never let go lord you never let go of me verse 1 even though i walk through the valley of the shadow of death your perfect love is casting out fear even when im caught in the middle of the storms of this life i wont turn back i know you are near pre chorus and i will fear no e vil for my god is with me and if my god is with me whom then shall i fear whom then shall i fear chorus oh no you never let go through the calm and through the storm oh no you never let go in evry high and evry low oh no you never let go lord you never let go of me verse 2 and i can see a light that is coming for the heart that holds on a glorious light beyond all compare and there will be an end to these troubles but until that day comes well live to know you here on the earth bridge yes i can see a light that is coming for the heart that holds on and there will be an end to these troubles but until that day comes still i will praise you still i will praise you chorus oh no you never let go through the calm and through the storm oh no you never let go in evry high and evry low oh no you never let go lord you never let go of me

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [A]
VERSE 1: Even though I w[A]alk through the valley of the shadow of death Your [F#m7]perfect love is casting out fear Even when I'm c[A]aught in the middle of the storms of this life I [F#m7]won't turn back, I know you are near
PRE CHORUS: And I will fear no [F#m7 E A]e - vil For my God is [F#m7 E A]with me And if my God is [F#m7 E A]with - me Whom then shall I f[E]ear, whom then shall I f[D2]ear
CHORUS: [A]Oh no, You never let go, through the calm and through the storm [F#m7]Oh no, You never let go, in ev'ry high and ev'ry low [Esus]Oh no you never let go, [D2]Lord you never let go of me [A]
VERSE 2: And I can see a [A]light that is coming for the heart that holds on A glori[F#m7]ous light beyond all compare And there will be an [A]end to these troubles but until that day comes We'll [F#m7]live to know You here on the earth
BRIDGE: Yes, I can see a [A]light that is coming for the heart that holds on And there will be an [F#m7]end to these troubles but until that day comes [Esus]Still I will praise You, [Dsus]still I will praise you
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 even though i walk through the valley of the shadow of death your perfect love is casting out fear even when im caught in the middle of the storms of this life i wont turn back i know you are near pre chorus and i will fear no e vil for my god is with me and if my god is with me whom then shall i fear whom then shall i fear chorus oh no you never let go through the calm and through the storm oh no you never let go in evry high and evry low oh no you never let go lord you never let go of me verse 2 and i can see a light that is coming for the heart that holds on a glorious light beyond all compare and there will be an end to these troubles but until that day comes well live to know you here on the earth bridge yes i can see a light that is coming for the heart that holds on and there will be an end to these troubles but until that day comes still i will praise you still i will praise you
